Replace.Text: ruling space agency

Dawn Wanyuli characteristic area, which replaces the space center and is cheaper to build. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Regions required to build tech victory related items. These include launching Earth satellites, launching missions to the Moon, creating a Mars colony, and launching exoplanet expeditions. Cannot be built on hills.
Thunder Temple
＜Arbiter＞Mayuri
Thunder Templar's
Arrow of Judgment

+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when military units are fighting more advanced units. Unlock featured items that increase or decrease Era Points. [NEWLINE]Unlock historical moments with more than 2 Era Scores and gain 1 additional Era Score when you get [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse. [NEWLINE]A dark age policy can be used even if it is not a [ICON_Glory_Dark_Age] dark age. [NEWLINE] Every time you enter the golden age [ICON_Glory_Golden_Age] or [ICON_Glory_Super_Golden_Age] heroic age, you can get +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity. When you decide to commit to the policy, in addition to the original other bonuses, you can also get the age score. [ICON_Glory_Normal_Age] Normal age bonus. [NEWLINE] When the player enters a new era, if the player's era exceeds the game era, all wonders in city construction will get [ICON_Production] productivity explosion; otherwise, all [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypses will be activated in this era.
Mayuri
Wanyuri (Dawn)
Manyuri (Inari)
Wanyuri (Christmas Eve)
Mayuri (Uniform)
Shenwei Lingzhuang · Wanfan

Building wonders is not restricted by terrain. The capital gains a lot of [ICON_Production] production when building the first wonder of each era. Whenever another civilization completes a wonder, the wonder under construction closest to the wonder gets a lot of [ICON_Production] production, if you are not building a wonder, let the closest city without a wonder get a lot of [ICON_Production] when it builds the first wonder ICON_Production] Productivity. [NEWLINE]When you build a Wonder, gain [ICON_Production] Burst of Production if none of the other civs have the required technology or civics for the Wonder. [NEWLINE] When you fail to compete for a wonder, you can save part of the consumed [ICON_Production] production and divert it to the next wonder to build. [NEWLINE]Constructing wonders is not restricted by landforms, and cities get double [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance and +1 [ICON_Amenities] satisfaction from wonders.
breaking Dawn

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Wanfan", historical moments related to space exploration will receive additional era points, wonders will receive additional bonuses, and military units will be strengthened when developing future technologies. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In addition, it has other traits of dressing up Miyuri.
oracle

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Wanfan", when you travel around the world, the Thunder Temple will be strengthened; if you are the first civilization in the world to travel around the world, you can spread religious pressure in cities with holy places, and the effect is the same as Holy cities are similar (spread 4x religious pressure to all cities within 10 cells). [NEWLINE]Wonders you build gain an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic slot and gain additional bonuses. Each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] cultural relic and [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] sculpture art masterpiece +2 [ICON_Food] food, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 [ICON_Faith] faith value and +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
Christmas gift

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Wanfan", when you disperse the barbarian outpost, you will get tribal village rewards and experience points. When a wonder is built, get a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse from the era of the wonder. All cities are created with an additional production cost of the lowest downtown building. When the professional area outside the municipal square is built, it has a certain chance to include the building that is currently buildable and has the lowest production cost in the area.
Dragonfly Jade

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Wanfan", when an emergency occurs, an additional bonus will be obtained. Earn rewards even if emergency events are not completed. [NEWLINE]When you create a [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route with a more advanced civilization, you can get the corresponding [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse. [NEWLINE] Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant or [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka: Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatProphet] ] Great Prophet, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist or [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral of the Navy, you trigger a [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse. [NEWLINE]The professional area of ​​the city where the third-level chief executive is located provides 1 corresponding [ICON_greatperson] great person point.
Judge

Try to find all natural wonders. Like keeping woods and rainforests from being logged and creating national parks. [NEWLINE]Want to build wonders whenever possible, preferring civilizations that don't compete for them. Hate losing wonders to other civs. [NEWLINE]Admiring civilizations that explore the world, and dislikes people who huddle within their own boundaries. [NEWLINE]Envy civilizations that have entered the [ICON_Glory_Golden_Age] golden age. Dislikes civilizations entering the [ICON_Glory_Dark_Age] Dark Age.
Thunder Temple
Thunder Templar (Cow)
Thunder Sanctuary (Grizzly)
Thunder Sanctuary (human)
Thunder Sanctuary (Lion)
Thunder Temple (Sword of Radiant Flame)

Wanyuri unique super unit can only have one at a time. [NEWLINE]Attacks splash to adjacent enemy units. Combat capabilities can be upgraded and transformation forms can be unlocked through research and development of technology. [NEWLINE][COLOR_RED] has a certain chance to go berserk (becoming a barbarian unit) after attacking. [ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED] Runaway! [END COLOR]
Takes 20% less non-lethal damage. Ignores [ICON_Movement] movement cost of terrain and rivers. [COLOR_RED] After attacking, there is a chance to go berserk (becoming a barbarian unit). [ENDCOLOR]
If the damage point is higher than the opponent's, the defending enemy unit will be pushed to the rear cell.
If there is remaining [ICON_Movement] movement power, you can move after attacking.
Within two cells, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength and +1 [ICON_Movement] movement strength for land units.
All adjacent enemy units -5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Transforms Thunder Sanctum into bull form. Gain Abilities: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_USHI_DESCRIPTION}
Transforms Thunder Sanctum into Eagle form. Ability Gained: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_WASHI_DESCRIPTION}
Transforms Thunder Sanctum into human form. Gain Abilities: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_HITO_DESCRIPTION}
Transforms Thunder Sanctum into lion form. Gaining abilities: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_SHIHSI_DESCRIPTION}

Transforms Thunder Sanctum into Radiant Flame Sword form. Ability Gained: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_USHI_DESCRIPTION}[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_WASHI_DESCRIPTION}[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERU BIEL_HITO_DESCRIPTION}[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{LOC_ABILITY_MAYURI_KERUBIEL_SHIHSI_DESCRIPTION}
Adjudicator
Inari Manyuri's characteristic land combat unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_Strength] Combat strength has been enhanced with the evolution of the times, and has a unique strengthening tree.
in the name of god
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against units of other religions. If killed in a Theological War, a relic will be generated.
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength against units of other religions
Prophecy
When defeating an enemy unit, gain the [ICON_Faith] faith value equal to the unit's [ICON_Strength] combat power. [NEWLINE]Twice the flank attack bonus.
plunder
When defeating an enemy unit, get [ICON_Gold] gold coins equal to the unit's [ICON_Strength] combat power. [NEWLINE]This unit can only be seen by adjacent enemy units.
bastion of faith

+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in all situations. Additional +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. [NEWLINE]When this unit kills an enemy unit, it will spread its religion to surrounding cities.
+5[ICON_Strength] Combat strength comes from the fortress of faith
+5[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending
Baptism of blood
+15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in all situations. Extra +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when attacking.
+5[ICON_Strength] Combat strength comes from the Baptism of Blood
+5[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking
Knights Templar
Get healed at the end of the round. [NEWLINE] If [ICON_Movement] movement allows, +1 extra attack per turn.
templar
Looting only requires 1 [ICON_Movement] movement force. +50 health when looting any improvement or area. [NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Movement] Movement.
enlightenment
+25 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in all situations. Intimidates adjacent enemy units, giving them -5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
+10[ICON_Strength] Combat strength comes from revelation
-5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to a terrifying enemy
Judgment ecomuseum

Wanyuri characteristic improvements. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gives this city +2 [ICON_Loyalty] Loyalty each turn. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value. +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value and +2 [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance for each city on various terrains (snow, tundra, desert, plain, grassland). Only one can be built per city. Cells with ecomuseums cannot be exchanged.
Verdict Studios
Wanyuri's characteristic building, replacing the Broadcasting Center. [NEWLINE]In modern times, this city provides +100% [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance pressure for other civs.
ruling icon

Wanyuri is a unique spectacle. Unlocks the form of the Sword of Lightning Flame in the Temple of Thunder. [NEWLINE]Get full yield, [ICON_Housing] housing, and [ICON_Citizen] citizen loyalty pressure bonuses from every city in the world; get corresponding yields, great man points, and most traits from wonders around the world. All cities are always 100% [ICON_Loyalty] loyal, and cities of other civilizations can skip the free city stage and become their own cities directly. [NEWLINE]Your city is forced to become the capital of [ICON_Capital], [COLOR_RED] and the rest of the city is converted to a free city, and you can't train or buy pioneers. [ENDCOLOR]

Azura is the demon god of dawn and dusk, the mother of roses, the queen of the night sky, one of the few demon gods who are considered kind by mortals, and one of the few demon gods who always maintain a female image. [NEWLINE]A daedric who never cheats, who can get what she wants and make things go her way, her followers describe her as a cruel but wise monarch.
+{1_num}[ICON_Science] Science from adjacent rainforest {1_Num : plural 1?cell; other?cell;}, from Chichen Itza.
Gain +{1_num}[ICON_Faith] Faith from adjacent Lake or Coast tiles, from Temple of Huey.
Shah Jahan
Adding Productivity to Spectacle

[ICON_Production] is given production capacity when building wonders, and its upper limit is half of the current national treasury. Then consume the double [ICON_Gold] gold coins of [ICON_Production] productivity purchased.
Become a Stonehenge owner
Provides 15% productivity when in progress [ICON_Faith]. Unlocks owner bonus on completion: +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 [ICON_Production] Production for all quarries.
Become the owner of the ancient city of Petra

Provides food [ICON_Food] with 15% productivity when in progress. Unlocks owner bonus upon completion: +20% [ICON_Food] food, +20% [ICON_Gold] gold, +10% [ICON_Production] production for all cities created on the desert.
Become the owner of Great Zimbabwe
Provides 15% productivity gold [ICON_Gold] during the process. Unlock owner bonus upon completion: +20% [ICON_Gold] gold coins for this city.
Become the owner of the Armory of Venice

Provides 15% productivity gold [ICON_Gold] during the process. Unlock the owner's bonus when completed: +30% [ICON_Production] productivity of naval units built in the city, except for aircraft carriers; +3 [ICON_Gold] gold coins for naval units; +1 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] naval commander points if merchants are in water cells .
Become the owner of Kilwa Kiswani
Technology [ICON_Science] and culture [ICON_Culture] that provide 15% productivity during the process. Unlocks owner bonus on completion: +5 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn.
Become a large bath owner
Provides 15% productivity when in progress [ICON_Faith]. Unlocks owner bonus on completion: +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Production] Production for all floodplain cells.
Pyramid Inspiration
Pyramids provide +1 [ICON_Movement] movement
Guidance from the Great Lighthouse
Great Lighthouse gives +1 vision
Inspiration of the Colossus
When fighting in the country's territory or in areas adjacent to the country's territory, all units have +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength from the Colossus.
+3 from Colossus
Inspiration from the Colosseum
The Colosseum provides +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
+5 from the Colosseum
zeus power
+5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when adjacent to anti-cavalry units, from the statue of Zeus
+5 from adjacent anti-cavalry units (statue of Zeus)
Zeus' blessing
Zeus statues provide +1 [ICON_Movement] movement.
Alhambra buff
Provides +2 [ICON_Movement] movement to civilian religious units within 2 tiles, from the Alhambra.
Alhambra buff
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement from melee units within 2 tiles, from the Alhambra.
Alhambra buff
Provides +2 [ICON_Movement] movement to melee units within 2 tiles, from the Alhambra.
Alhambra buff
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement from civilian religious units within 2 tiles, from the Alhambra.
Hagia Sophia Blessing
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against civilizations that believe in other religions, from Hagia Sophia.
+4 against civilizations practicing other religions from Hagia Sophia
Hagia Sophia Blessing
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against civilizations that believe in other religions, from Hagia Sophia.
+4 against civilizations practicing other religions from Hagia Sophia
Venetian Armory Buff
Give your capital +3 [ICON_Gold] gold from the Armory of Venice.
Venetian Armory Buff
If in a water tile, +1 [ICON_Great Admiral] Admiral Points from the Venetian Armory.
Terra Buff
If it is within 1 cell of a military improvement facility, +2 [ICON_Movement] movement, +1 [ICON_Range] range, from Terracotta Warriors.
Blessing of Artemis
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Temple of Artemis when attacking if enemy is on pasture, camp and adjacent cells.
+5 from Temple of Artemis
Great Buddha's encouragement
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against civilizations that believe in other religions, from Gaodeyuan.
+4 against civilizations of other religions from Kotokuin
Blessing of Meenakshi Temple
+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for the current and adjacent cells, from Meenakshi Temple.
Mayuri likes civilizations that can explore the world
Wanyuri doesn't like civilizations that don't explore

My mission with the Thunder Sanctuary is over, and then my existence will gradually disintegrate and return to nothing. (Mayuri was defeated.)
There is no reason, just make a judgment and disappear, that's how I was designed, that's all. (Mayuri was defeated.)

I am the crystallization of spiritual power.
<Adjudicator>
A girl with long, straight ponytails and pink eyes. Always alone, he quietly cast his gaze at Shidou.

Identification name: Judgment; Spiritual Clothes: Kamui Spiritual Dress, Wanfan, with four wings, decorated with red spheres, a wheel-shaped ornament on the chest, a black one-piece skirt with gold trim, and golden lion head-shaped knees Leggings; Angel: Thunder Temple is a huge flying object with a black sphere as the center and four angel wings.
